name: Splashy - a color matching puzzle game
name_original: Splashy - a color matching puzzle game
description:
Play Spashy - an endless color puzzle game!

Match the given pattern to advance!

Drag the colors from the bottom into a cell to solve the color puzzle!

Use the colors in the bottom to get the same pattern.

Levels are generated randomly, so you will have endless levels!

Multiple difficulty color puzzle levels with more coming each update!

Unlock new color puzzle types with coins.

Play Spashy now!
